data.actual_result: You hear '[Username] said "Underscore Underscore Words Underscore Underscore"'
data.expected_result: You will hear '[Username] said "Words"' as the Underscores are markdown, You can prove that markdown is not supposed to be read allowed by typing "/tts `**words**` You will hear the narrator just saying "Words" instead of "asterisk asterisk Words asterisk asterisk"
data.short_description: Underscore markdown is read alowed in /tts
data.steps_to_repro: - In a channel in the same guild type '/tts `__words__`'
